member.summary: The annotation should be activated as soon as the page containing the annotation is opened.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DActivationMode.PageVisible

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DActivationMode.ExplicitActivation
member.summary: The annotation should remain inactive until explicitly activated by a script or user action.

member.summary: The artwork is instantiated, but real-time script-driven animations are disabled.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DActivationState.Live
member.summary: Real-time script-driven animations are enabled if present; if not, the artwork is instantiated.

member.summary: Gets or sets the time multiplier.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DAnimationStyle.None
member.summary: Keyframe animations should not be driven directly by the viewer application. This value is used by documents that are intended to drive animations through an alternate means, such as JavaScript.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DAnimationStyle.Linear
member.summary: Keyframe animations are driven linearly from beginning to end. This animation style results in a repetitive playthrough of the animation, such as in a walking motion.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DAnimationStyle.Oscillating
member.summary: Keyframe animations should oscillate along their time range. This animation style results in a back-and-forth playing of the animation, such as exploding or collapsing parts.

member.summary: Lights as specified in the 3D artwork.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.White
member.summary: Three blue-grey infinite lights, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Day
member.summary: Three light-grey infinite lights, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Night
member.summary: One yellow, one aqua, and one blue infinite light, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Hard
member.summary: Three grey infinite lights, moderate ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Primary
member.summary: One red, one green, and one blue infinite light, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Blue
member.summary: Three blue infinite lights, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Red
member.summary: Three red infinite lights, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Cube
member.summary: Six grey infinite lights aligned with the major axes, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.CAD
member.summary: Three grey infinite lights and one light attached to the camera, no ambient term.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DLightingStyle.Headlamp
member.summary: Single infinite light attached to the camera, low ambient term.

member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRendering
member.summary: Defines the style in which the 3D artwork is rendered.

member.name: P:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRendering.AuxiliaryColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the auxiliary color.

member.name: P:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRendering.CreaseValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the crease value.

member.name: P:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRendering.FaceColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the face color.

member.name: P:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRendering.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering mode.

member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode
member.summary: Supported modes for rendering the 3D images.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.Solid
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.SolidWireframe
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes (triangles) with single color edges on top of them. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.Transparent
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes (triangles) with an added level of transparency. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.TransparentWireframe
member.summary: Displays textured and lit geometric shapes (triangles) with an added level of transparency, with single color opaque edges on top of it. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.BoundingBox
member.summary: Displays the bounding box edges of each node. The color of the bounding box edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.TransparentBoundingBox
member.summary: Displays bounding boxes faces of each node with an added level of transparency. The color of the bounding box faces is determined by the face color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.TransparentBoundingBoxOutline
member.summary: Displays bounding boxes edges and faces of each node with an added level of transparency. The color of the bounding box edges is determined by the auxiliary color. The color of the bounding boxes faces is determined by the face color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.Wireframe
member.summary: Displays only edges in a single color. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.ShadedWireframe
member.summary: Displays only edges and applies lighting. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.HiddenWireframe
member.summary: Displays edges in a single color, though removes back-facing and obscured edges. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.Vertices
member.summary: Displays only vertices in a single color. The color of these points is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.ShadedVertices
member.summary: Displays only vertices, though uses their vertex color and applies lighting. The auxiliary color is ignored.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.Illustration
member.summary: Displays silhouette edges with surfaces, removes obscured lines. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color, and the color of the surfaces is determined by the face color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.SolidOutline
member.summary: Displays silhouette edges with lit and textured surfaces, removes obscured lines. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Annotations.Pdf3DRenderingMode.ShadedIllustration
member.summary: Displays silhouette edges with lit and textured surfaces and an additional emissive term to remove poorly lit areas of the artwork. The color of these edges is determined by the auxiliary color.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageFormat.Raw
member.summary: The image is embedded in the Pdf file in RAW format.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageFormat.Jpeg
member.summary: The image is embedded in the Pdf file as a JPEG image.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageFormat.Jpeg2000
member.summary: The image is embedded in the Pdf file as a JPEG2000 image.

member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageSaveFormat
member.summary: Specifies the supported formats for saving a visual image.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageSaveFormat.Native
member.summary:
The image is saved in the format used for storing it in the Pdf file.
Note: JPEG2000 images can be saved only in native format.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageSaveFormat.Raw
member.summary: The image is saved in RAW format. Note: JPEG2000 images cannot be saved in RAW format.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageSaveFormat.Tiff
member.summary: The image is saved in TIFF format. Note: JPEG2000 images cannot be saved in TIFF format.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Content.PdfVisualImageSaveFormat.Png
member.summary: The image is saved in PNG format. Note: JPEG2000 images cannot be saved in PNG format.

member.summary: A destination to a page identified by a .

member.summary: A destination to a page identified by its page number.

member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode
member.summary: Supported zoom modes for a destination.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.XYZ
member.summary: Display the destination page, with the coordinates (, ) positioned at the upper-left corner of the window and the contents of the page magnified by the factor .

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.Fit
member.summary: Display the destination page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the entire page within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.FitH
member.summary: Display the destination page, with the vertical coordinate positioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of the page within the window.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.FitV
member.summary: Display the destination page, with the horizontal coordinate positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of the page within the window.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.FitR
member.summary: Display the destination page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the rectangle specified by the coordinates , , , and entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.FitB
member.summary: Display the destination page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit its bounding box entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.FitBH
member.summary: Display the destination page, with the vertical coordinate positioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of its bounding box within the window.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Destinations.PdfDestinationZoomMode.FitBV
member.summary: Display the destination page, with the horizontal coordinate positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of its bounding box within the window.
